document_data.name: Dauna Lorastur
document_data.mainbody: '''Dauna Lorastur''' was the High Lord of [[Marrauk]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.Background: Dauna was a calm person, well-liked by her subjects. However, as of 1479 DR, she grew defiant of the [[green dragon]] [[Orlarrakh]], making her three young sons fear for her safety.
